bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality.

bibl.seg: Subías Eva, Oxyrhynchos: Metropolis and Landscape. Avec résumé en anglais.

Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz and Rosa Cuesta (Edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22 (Tarragona, 2011) pp. 93-128, tabl., 10 figg. n./bl. et coul.; - 221.
